name: AKB48 World
storyline:
Synopsis
At a small theater in Akihabara, that place I happened to stop by.
I met girls who were eager to make their dreams come true.
That's when my dream of becoming a producer of AKB48 was born.
And on the way to my first day of work, closer to my dream...
By chance, I met that girl.

How to enjoy AKB48 WORLD
1. produce your favorite members!
Directly produce the members you like!
Become a producer and raise the level of intimacy between you and your favorite members!
You can see the secret story of your favorite member when you increase the density. 2.

2. training & awakening
Train your favorite members!
Level up your cards to increase the value of your members' abilities!
When you awaken a card, the member's secret video is unlocked!
Once you've awakened a card, you'll be able to unlock the member's secret video! Collect secret videos that can only be found in AKB48 WORLD. 3.

3. you can now video call the members!
AKB48 relies on you, the producer!
From exchanging e-mails to video calls!
You can communicate with members who are looking for you, the producer.

There are even other special social pages that can only be found on AKB48 WORLD!
If you want to see new posts tweeted by your favorite members, download it now!

4. adjust members' schedules!
Adjust the schedules of your members to make AKB48 a top idol!
How about working with the girls on their commercial shooting schedule today?
